alert.note: Alert for Dale; Geneva; Houston (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 06 at 4:24PM CDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Dale, eastern Geneva and west central Houston Counties through 500 PM CDT... At 424 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Hartford, or near Geneva, moving northeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Daleville, Hartford, Slocomb, Clayhatchee, Black, Kellys Crossroads, High Bluff, Highfalls, Dundee, Bald Hill, Hendrix Crossroad, Bailey Crossroad and Wicksburg. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
